title: CliSchema Executor Options

dryRun.describe: Print the commands that would be run, but don't actually run them

fromPkg.describe: Path to package.json of the Nx plugin for auto deriving schemas

config.describe: Path to a configuration file (if not provided, e.g. zod2nx-schema.config.ts)

tsconfig.describe: Path to a TypaScript configuration file used to resolve config files

skipFormat.describe: Skip formatting generated files with Prettier

output.describe: Output path for print-config command (if not provided, prints to stdout)

schema.description: Path to the module exporting the Zod schema

outPath.description: Path to output the generated JSON schema file

exportName.description: Name of the export in the module (default: "default")

description: Zod to NxSchema executor. Executes the @push-based/zod2nx-schema command's See: https://github.com/push-based/zod2nx-schema/README.md#commands
